name: Ramzan Cricket Pro
description: Ramzan Cricket is specially developed and designed for Ramadan festival. Experience a new format of fast cricket game. This is the fastest cricket game that offers you the chance to bat always. After selecting overs from 3/6/9/12 you will get an auto generated target to chase. Simple playing controls make the game easy and challenging. You can choose your favorite avatar from 8 different characters. Playing of the game is simple; just hit the ball, if you hit timely you will get 6/4/3/2/1 runs if you missed the ball you might lose the wicket. Download now and test your cricket playing skills in this challenging format of the game.
